name: luhn-algorithm
description: The [Luhn](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luhn_algorithm) algorithm or Luhn formula (also known as "modulus 10" or "mod 10" algorithm) is used to authemtical the validity of identification numbers such as credit card numbers, Canadian Social Insurance Number, South African ID Number, IMEI numbers, National Provider Identifier numbers (US), etc. This uses a simple formaula, checksum to validate these numbers.
